DOC.brief_summary: This purpose of this study was to test the use of chewing gum as an adjunct to lifestyle modification to facilitate appetite control and weight loss in overweight and obese individuals.
DOC.brief_title: Use of Chewing Gum to Facilitate Appetite Control and Weight Loss
